name: MERN E-Commerce Website
info: Backend deployed via Render, using Express with MongoDB. Utilizes various packages for authentication, payment processing (Braintree), controllers for user, category, and product actions
info2: Frontend deployed via Vercel, utilizes React with various packages for testing, UI components (Ant Design), routing (React Router), and state management (Context API).
team: This is the project that was individually done by me and completed in 10 Days.

name: Algorithm visualizer
info: Developed an interactive platform for visualizing sorting and searching algorithms to aid user understanding. Responsible for UI design and ensuring responsiveness across devices
info2: Implemented functionalities for complex algorithms like backtracking and binary search. Collaborated with a team of five, managing medium-level contributions in feature development.
team: A collaborative project of 5 team members completed in 5 days.

name: Campaign Monitor
info: Connecting with your audience has never been easier with Campaign Monitor's straightforward email marketing and automation tools.
info2: Connecting with your audience has never been easier with Campaign Monitor's straightforward email marketing and automation tools.
team: This is the project that was individually done by me and completed in 5 Days.
tstack: HTML | CSS | JAVASCRIPT | REACT | CHAKRA UI

name: Finance Manager
info: Backend and Authentication: The backend is powered by Firebase, utilizing its Realtime Database for efficient storage and retrieval of financial data. Firebase Authentication is implemented to ensure secure user login and account management.
info2: Frontend and Data Visualization: The frontend is developed in React, with Tailwind CSS for an elegant and responsive UI. Financial data is beautifully visualized using Chart.js, providing users with interactive graphs and insights into their income, expenses, and savings trends.
team: This is the project that was individually done by me and completed in 1 Days.

name: Finder

info2: It is social media and multiuser site where you can post the articles
